descriptionHtml:
Bet you didn\'t expect an update for this mod, especially after this long time. :P
Version 1.1. Improved normal maps for less plastic like look, also the alpha channel displays correctly so the lace looks right now.

NOTES:
1. This is a texture mod only, so you need to get the original one by SydneyB http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5577
2. The corset clips through the skirt in some pics because of the idle replacer I\'m using.
3. The stockings are not part of this mod, and no, I couldn\'t take those off when taking pictures for they are part of the body texture itself.
4. Lacking better male pictures, BECAUSE, I don\'t have any male saves.

I love the mesh on this outfit and I\'ve wanted to retexture this for quite a while now, but it seemed to require a lot of work so I didn\'t do it. Until now. I\'m a little sick at the moment so I decided to do something interesting (as I can\'t sleep...), this is something thrown together in several hours of texture editing, image file conversions and taking screenshots. I hope that atleast someone likes these :) I don\'t really think that there\'s anything wrong with the original textures, I\'m just a sucker for pretty patterns~ The male version is not as good and \'well-made\' as the female one, which is why I uploaded separate files for the versions incase someone only wants the ladies outfits. Most of the normal maps have been modified to the new textures.

I have taken in a bad habit of calling most of my retextures \'Royal\'... All those poor souls who have been mislead by the title, I\'ve never been good with names/titles.

As always, feel free to add your own images and tell me your opinions! :)

On completely unrelated note; Got my \"Kill \'em with your awesome\" shirt~
author: Messias Mummo
